definitions.definition: ( archaic or obsolete ) Chiefly of a place : which has been ridded ( sense 1.4.1 ) or cleared ; rid-up .

main_definition: ( archaic or obsolete ) Chiefly of a place : which has been ridded ( sense 1.4.1 ) or cleared ; rid-up .

definitions.definition: As the second word in a compound : synonym of ridden ( “ full of; also, dominated , oppressed , or plagued by ” ) .
Only in well-rid : of a horse : ridden .

main_definition: As the second word in a compound : synonym of ridden ( “ full of; also, dominated , oppressed , or plagued by ” ) .
secondary_definitions: ( postpositive , obsolete ) Only in well-rid : of a horse : ridden .
